{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3142231,"name":"Landon","username":"Lfehr","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/l/47e85d/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-02-09T02:38:19.019Z","cooked":"

Does anyone know where I can to find how to change the pipeline on a lime light? Does anyone have example code they are willing to share?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2023-02-09T02:38:19.019Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":65,"reads":60,"readers_count":59,"score":337.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":426198,"topic_slug":"how-to-change-pipelines-on-a-lime-light","display_username":"Landon","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53962,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/how-to-change-pipelines-on-a-lime-light/426198/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3142234,"name":"","username":"CrazyMetic","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/crazymetic/{size}/172052_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-09T02:49:52.051Z","cooked":"

You can change the Pipeline value in NetworkTables. Sample code can be found in the docs:

https://docs.limelightvision.io/en/latest/using_multiple_pipelines.html#using-multiple-pipelines

For example, in our code, we set the pipeline to 1 as such:

ll_table.getEntry("pipeline").setNumber(1);

Hope this helps.
